original_text: When the male sheep is cooked, the priest must take its shoulder. Also, he must take one cake and one thin biscuit from the basket. The cake and the biscuit must not have yeast in them. The priest must put these things into the hands of the Nazirite who has removed the hair from his head.
korean_text: 자기의 몸을 구별한 나실인이 그의 머리 털을 민 후에 제사장이 삶은 숫양의 어깨와 광주리 가운데 무교병 하나와 무교전병 하나를 취하여 나실인의 두 손에 두고

sentences.original_text: When the male sheep is cooked
the priest must take its shoulder
Also, he must take one cake
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 그는 떡 하나를 가져야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and one thin biscuit from the basket
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 바구니에서 얇은 비스킷 하나를 가져야 합니다

sentences.original_text: The cake and the biscuit must not have yeast in them
sentences.korean_translation: 그 떡과 비스킷에는 누룩이 없어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: The priest must put these things into the hands
of the Nazirite who has removed the hair from his head
